text: Home is where love resides, memories are created, friends always belong, and laughter never ends.
author: Unknown

text: There's no place like home.
author: Dorothy Gale (The Wizard of Oz)

text: Home is not a place, it's a feeling.
author: Unknown

text: The magic thing about home is that it feels good to leave, and it feels even better to come back.
author: Wendy Wunder

text: Home is where your story begins.
author: Unknown

text: Home is where one starts from.
author: T.S. Eliot

text: Home is the starting place of love, hope, and dreams.
author: Unknown

text: Home is where we should feel secure and comfortable.
author: Catherine Pulsifer

text: A house is made of bricks and beams. A home is made of love and dreams.
author: Unknown

text: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
author: Robert Frost

text: A home is a kingdom of its own in the midst of the world, a stronghold amid life's storms and stresses, a refuge, even a sanctuary.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

text: Home is a place you grow up wanting to leave, and grow old wanting to get back to.
author: John Ed Pearce

text: Home is the nicest word there is.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

text: Home is not where you live, but where they understand you.
author: Christian Morgenstern

text: A comfortable house is a great source of happiness. It ranks immediately after health and a good conscience.
author: Sydney Smith

text: Home is the most important place on earth, and the bedrock of our lives.
author: Joanna Gaines

text: A home is a place where you can be yourself and be accepted for who you are.
author: Unknown

text: Home is where you can be yourself and be surrounded by the people who love you.
author: Unknown

text: Home is where the heart is.
author: Pliny the Elder

text: A house becomes a home when you can write "I love you" on the furniture.
author: Unknown

text: Home should be a place where it's okay to make mistakes.
author: J. California Cooper

text: Home is where you feel loved, appreciated, and safe.
author: Tracy Taylor

text: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
author: Benjamin Franklin
